mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
,
from issue
order by ${orderByClause}
limit #{start},#{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into issue (issue_id, issue_name, create_time, creator, last_operator, last_update_time, filtered_content, cluster_result, modified_cluster_result, orig_count_result, modified_orig_count_result, statistic_result ) values (#{issueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{filteredContent,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY}, #{clusterResult,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY}, #{modifiedClusterResult,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY}, #{origCountResult,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY}, #{modifiedOrigCountResult,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY}, #{statisticResult,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} )
